title: Sceat
author: Sceat
content: This is just a prototype but it may become interesting in the near future,Â I'm currently able to mint NFTs when a player loot a ressource on a mob  and made a demo here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BBck2EW_7AQIt's open-source for anyone interested in helping or watching around! the github repo is @aresrpg
